title: Robo War
venue: Himalaya College of Engineering, Chyasal, Lalitpur
desc: Robo War is an ultimate battle between autonomous robots. The teams will compete in a thrilling arena where their robots will engage in fierce combat, utilizing various strategies and weaponry. The competition will test the agility, control, and design of the robots.

title: Robo Soccer
venue: Himalaya College of Engineering, Chyasal, Lalitpur
desc: Robo Soccer combines the excitement of soccer with the marvels of robotics. The teams will design and program autonomous robots capable of playing soccer, competing against each other in a challenging soccer field. This competition will evaluate the robots' agility, ball control, teamwork, and strategy.

title: Robo Race
venue: Himalaya College of Engineering, Chyasal, Lalitpur
desc: Robo Race is a fast-paced competition where teams will showcase their engineering prowess by creating autonomous racing robots. The robots will navigate through a track filled with obstacles, showcasing their speed, precision, and obstacle avoidance capabilities. It will be a thrilling display of cutting-edge technology and innovation.
